screen_desc: This screenshot shows the home screen of an Android smartphone displaying four app icons: Gmail, Photos, YouTube, and a few others. The weather widget at the top indicates the current day is Monday, August 1, with a temperature of 62°F. The time is 12:59 PM.

Scroll through the app drawer to find the AliExpress app
Tap on the AliExpress app to open it
